chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: The purpose of this tutorial is to give an overall idea of how to use the SQLContainer add-on when developing with Vaadin. We'll explore some basic use cases and how to build a Vaadin application with basic database usage.

This tutorial will be adding persistency to the Address book tutorial using the SQLContainer add-on. Visually, the application will stay exactly the same. We will add or change the following things with respect to the Address book tutorial:

itemizedlist.listitem: Storing items in an SQL database
Handle relations between SQL tables when displaying them in a Vaadin table
Searching and filtering in the SQLContainer
